catentdesc.name: Compact Fluorescent Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Energy-efficient, screw-in spiral bulb
catentdesc.longdescription: Compared to an incandescent bulb, this CFL bulb uses 75% less energy. Frosted bulb is suitable for indoor use in lamps and sconces to simulate natural sunlight. Bulbs with a yellow finish will repel insects. Note that these bulbs contain mercury and require safe disposal.

catentdesc.name: Medium-base Chandelier Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Screw-in bulb with elegant pointed tip
catentdesc.longdescription: This clear incandescent bulb is suitable for most chandeliers that accept medium-base (E26) bulbs. Emits a warm, golden light to make entranceways and dining areas more inviting.

catentdesc.name: Medium-base Chandelier Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Screw-in bulb with elegant pointed tip
catentdesc.longdescription: This clear incandescent bulb is suitable for most chandeliers that accept medium-base (E26) bulbs. Emits a warm, golden light to make entranceways and dining areas more inviting.

catentdesc.name: Standard Incandescent Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Standard household bulb with varying wattage
catentdesc.longdescription: This low-cost bulb is suitable for general indoor use. Bulbs produce a warm, yellow-white light. Available in a clear or frosted finish.

catentdesc.name: Dual-tube Ultraviolet Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black light blue fluorescent bulb with screw-in base
catentdesc.longdescription: Manufactured with high-quality black blue glass, this bulb can be used in multiple applications, including counterfeit detection, medical examination, and theatrical special effects. Suitable for any E26 socket.

catentdesc.name: Screw-in LED Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Dimmable energy-saving floodlight bulb
catentdesc.longdescription: Lasting up to 25 times longer than a halogen bulb, this energy-efficient alternative bulb provides a 40-degree beam-spread angle. Suitable for any E26 socket.

catentdesc.name: Screw-in LED Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Dimmable energy-saving floodlight bulb
catentdesc.longdescription: Lasting up to 25 times longer than a halogen bulb, this energy-efficient alternative bulb provides a 40-degree beam-spread angle. Suitable for any E26 socket.

catentdesc.name: Screw-in LED Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Dimmable energy-saving floodlight bulb
catentdesc.longdescription: Lasting up to 25 times longer than a halogen bulb, this energy-efficient alternative bulb provides a 40-degree beam-spread angle. Suitable for any E26 socket.

catentdesc.name: Screw-in LED Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Dimmable energy-saving floodlight bulb
catentdesc.longdescription: Lasting up to 25 times longer than a halogen bulb, this energy-efficient alternative bulb provides a 40-degree beam-spread angle. Suitable for any E26 socket.

catentdesc.name: Halogen Floodlight Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Multifaceted reflector (MR16) bulb that produces a wide beam of white light
catentdesc.longdescription: This high-efficiency, low voltage bulb offers a whiter light than an incandescent bulb. Ideal for both residential and commercial lighting. With a 40-degree beam-spread angle, this bulb is capable of illuminating a wide area.

catentdesc.name: Halogen Floodlight Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Multifaceted reflector (MR16) bulb that produces a wide beam of white light
catentdesc.longdescription: This high-efficiency, low voltage bulb offers a whiter light than an incandescent bulb. Ideal for both residential and commercial lighting. With a 40-degree beam-spread angle, this bulb is capable of illuminating a wide area.

catentdesc.name: Candelabra Incandescent Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Flame-shaped screw-in bulb with clear or frosted finish
catentdesc.longdescription: Perfect for sconces and chandeliers, this bulb emits a soft light from a symmetrical B10-shaped bulb. Candelabra base is standard 1/2-inch diameter. Indoor use only.

catentdesc.shortdescription: Flame-shaped screw-in bulb with clear or frosted finish
catentdesc.longdescription: Perfect for sconces and chandeliers, this bulb emits a soft light from a symmetrical B10-shaped bulb. Candelabra base is standard 1/2-inch diameter. Indoor use only.

catentdesc.name: Linear Fluorescent Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Shatter-resistant T12 fluorescent bulb with 2-pin base
catentdesc.longdescription: This versatile bulb can be used both indoors and outdoors. Features a special plastic coating that retains glass shards in case of breakage. Intended for use with instant-start ballasts.

catentdesc.name: Neon Indicator Bulb
catentdesc.shortdescription: Miniature glow lamp that emits an orange-red light
catentdesc.longdescription: Typically used as indicator lamps in the displays of electronic instruments and appliances, this miniature bulb can resist shock and vibration. Rated life is up to 25,000 hours.
